title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, letting you run and chat with models from Python code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, exposing chat, embed, and generate interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, models, RAG, admin) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models for chat and generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat and generate actions to workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, and Nginx.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: Experimental ChatGPT plugin that proxies requests to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for Stable-Diffusion-webUI that adds LLM prompt generation via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for integrating Ollama into mobile/desktop apps.
